name: Basic Crudo
keywords: appetizer, side dish, olive oil, pine nuts, sea bass, spring
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound black sea bass fillet (or other suitable raw fish -- wild salmon, fluke, bream, tuna, bluefish, Spanish mackerel, cod, striped bass or any other fish in season), skinned
Sprinkles of Hawaiian black lava or French
2 ounces toasted pine nuts, minced scallion, snipped chives, sliced asparagus, arugula or sorrel or any herb in season

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the fillet into 1/4-inch slices, against the grain, and arrange in a loose fan shape on 4 chilled plates.
Spoon the citrus juice over the fish, then sprinkle with a small amount of sea salt and the pepper.
Top each serving with 1/4 of the pine nuts and a teaspoon of the olive oil and serve immediately.
